original_title: 18 Years Old and I Think I'm Having a Heart Attack
overview: What does it feel like to have a panic attack? In this animated short from our Arts x Radio collaboration, Vancouver-based filmmaker and illustrator Karla Monterrosa animates a clip from CBC Radio'sCampus to imagine what it's like inside an 18-year-old's mind and body during her first attack.
tagline: This is how a panic attack feels.
title: 18 Years Old and I Think I'm Having a Heart Attack
